result.execSummary:
The defendant Cameron K Decker was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Narcotic Drugs, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(am).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

.

  Pay DOC Supervision fees.

Letter of apology to Officer that he ran from.

  Undergo any other assessments or evaluations deemed appropriate by PO and follow through with any treatment recommendations.

Credit for 9 days if probation revoked.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Justice Sanctions Violations notice, filed. EML note and file.  - 5 hrs CS weekly.
OFF RECORD - Def stopped in to see Judge after court.  Indicated he had his appt's set up.  Judge told him to get proof of the appt's and take it down to JSS.
for Sentence Modification - Set for a hearing TWB.

10:45 am Def in court, in custody.  John William Kellis appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Court imposed a sentence on Mr. Decker and there were some violations that came in.  I ordered he be held on a capias for a series of violations.  I did get a request to get back out...
Decker states he'll get right back on his meds and the methadone program and watch his grandson.  Kellis understands he has AODA issues.  He wouldn't be in custody if he would have complied with probation.  He's not revoked and been warned by JSS severaltimes. It doesn't appear he understands.  He keeps saying he's going to get help when released but he goes right back to the same activity...  I don't know if it makes sense to release him back into the community right now...  For some of it to be served on em.... he's squandering.
Courrt comments.  I'll need proof that you're set up for your counseling and comply with JSS.  Get those appointments set today or tomorrow.  I'll authorize your release today with those parameters.
arrested LCPD
